doc.field: Ivy K. Marvel and Diana Bowers-Smith
Ivy K. Marvel and Diana Bowers-Smith
The Class Photograph Collection consists of group photographs from Brooklyn schools, spanning the years 1904-2002.
The Class Photograph Collection consists of group photographs from Brooklyn schools, spanning the years 1904-2002.

This small collection documents graduating classes at various public and private schools in Brooklyn. Additionally, there are two photographs of the staff of Boys High School's student publication, the Recorder. Some photographs list student names on the verso, but most do not.
This is an artificial collection that has had several accruals. The original group was purchased from Brian Merlis in April of 2013.
